title: My phone often disconnects from the Wi-Fi network on its own
answer:
l   Restart the Wi-Fi hotspot, for example, the wireless router.

l   Turn the Wi-Fi switch off and then back on again.

l   Restart your phone.

Check whether the
wireless router is set to hide the SSID. If so, the network must be added
manually. Select **Add network...** in
the Wi-Fi settings and enter the network SSID following the on-screen prompts.
Please refer to the wireless router instructions for a detailed description of
the settings.
keywords: Wi-Fi, wireless network, connect to Wi-Fi
